subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham may be returning to the bench three days after making his Major League Soccer debut. Beckham aggravated his injured left ankle earlier this week, and his presence in the lineup will be a game-time decision as the Los Angeles Galaxy play the New England Revolution in Foxborough, Mass., today.Beckham played 21 minutes off the bench in the Galaxy’s 1-0 loss to D.C. United on Thursday. He had planned to play at least one half against the Revolution.
